aboutMe: Hello everyone! I'm Leandro Daniel Schugurensky, 23 years old, with experience in administrative roles. I specialize in technical tasks and as a Front-End developer, with expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I also have experience with Git and GitHub for version control, and I've worked with databases like MongoDB and Firebase. I use tools such as Google Suite and Microsoft Office for document management and creation, and NPM for Node.js package management. I also implement ESLint to ensure code quality in my projects. I am committed to continuous learning and constantly improving my skills as a developer, always aiming to create robust and efficient web applications.
hobbies: I enjoy going to the gym to stay active and fit. I also love outdoor walks, especially in nature. I'm passionate about reading, exploring various topics to keep learning, and I'm a Marvel universe fanatic, enjoying its movies and series.

textContact: Are you looking for someone with skills and experience for a new project or position? I'm available for new opportunities and would love to hear about your proposal. If you think my profile fits what you need, feel free to get in touch with me. Please fill out the following form and I'll contact you as soon as possible.
